Reviews.Content: Will be back in Frankfurt but definitely NOT in this hotel.       Emergency exit closed by net and TV
Reviews.Author: SpringLily

Reviews.Content: Great hotel, friendly staff, perfect city centre location! Friendly staff who are genuinely pleased to see you, intimate small hotel where you are welcomed and made to feel at ease. Rooms are pleasant, clean and well appointed.City centre location is absolutely perfect for walking straight to the sites and shopping precinct without using a taxi.
Reviews.Author: chrisacl

Reviews.Content: Wir sind sehr zufrieden mit...   showReview(18592196, 'full');
